    • Method Detail

      • of

        public static JkRepo.JkPublishConfig of()

      • ofSnapshotOnly

        public static JkRepo.JkPublishConfig ofSnapshotOnly(boolean uniqueSnapshot)
        Creates a JkRepo.JkPublishConfig for publishing snapshot version on the specified JkRepo. Release versions are not publishable on this JkRepo.JkPublishConfig

      • ofReleaseOnly

        public static JkRepo.JkPublishConfig ofReleaseOnly(boolean needSignature)
        Creates a JkRepo.JkPublishConfig for publishing non-snapshot version on the specified JkRepo. Snapshot versions are not publishable on this JkRepo.JkPublishConfig

      • getFilter

        public JkPublishFilter getFilter()
        Returns the filter used for this JkRepo.JkPublishConfig. Only modules accepted by this filter will pb published on this repo.
